successes.title: Ube WiFi Connected Smart Light Dimmer
successes.description: Control your lights from your smart phone - While you're home or while you're away.

Pledges.description: Ube Value Dimmer: The Value Smart Dimmer is our entry level dimmer. It has a two-button tactile interface instead of the multi-touch interface. It's still controllable from your smartphone and still has WiFi connectivity. IMPORTANT:  This reward will only be funded if we reach at least 500 units.  Otherwise, you will be able to upgrade your order to the premium dimmer for $20 extra.  Free US Shipping. $19 Shipping outside the US.

Early Bird - Premium Dimmer: We love our early backers. We're offering a $10 discount on the first 500 buyers of the top of the line Ube Premium Smart Dimmer. Free US Shipping. $19 Shipping outside the US.

Darn, I missed the Early Bird! - Premium Dimmer: Miss the early bird?  We're still offering a $5 discount on 50 of the top of the line Ube Premium Smart Dimmer. Free US Shipping. $19 Shipping outside the US.
Ube Premium Dimmer: Get the amazing Ube Smart Dimmer. Control your lights over WiFi from your smart phone. Free US Shipping. $19 Shipping outside the US.

Early Bird Premium Dimmer Room Pack: The dimmers work better when they are used together because they can talk to each other. Control a whole room. The first 100 backers at this level get a super discount on three Ube Premium Smart Dimmers. Free US Shipping. $19 Shipping outside the US.

Premium Dimmer Room Pack: The dimmers work better when they are used together because they can talk to each other. Control a whole room. Save twenty bucks when you order three Ube Smart Dimmers. Free US Shipping. $19 Shipping outside the US.

Early Bird Premium Dimmer Small House Pack: The dimmers work better when they are used together because they can talk to each other. Control all the lights in a small house or apartment. Go all out, order early and get a smoking deal on 10 Ube Smart Dimmers. We can only afford to offer this deal to a few of you. Free US Shipping. $29 Shipping outside the US.

Not Quite as Early Bird Premium Dimmer Small House Pack: Miss the early bird?  There's still a chance to save a little coin.  The dimmers work better when they are used together because they can talk to each other. Control all the lights in a small house or apartment. Go all out, order early and get a smoking deal on 10 Ube Smart Dimmers. We can only afford to offer this deal to a few of you. Free US Shipping. $29 Shipping outside the US.

Premium Dimmer Small House Pack: The dimmers work better when they are used together because they can talk to each other. Control all the lights in a small house or apartment. Control 10 light switches. Free US Shipping. $29 Shipping outside the US.

Premium Dimmer large house pack: The dimmers work better when they are used together because they can talk to each other. Control your whole house of 20 switches - LIKE A BOSS! Free US Shipping. $29 Shipping outside the US.

Love this concept? Want to see it really fly? This level gets you a negotiated reward.  You'll get to talk with Glen and Utz to come up with a reward that we all agree on. If you've got the credentials, we'll consider putting you on our board of advisors. Free worldwide shipping.
